description: 30-minute test in Week 4 with Multiple Choice Questions assessing understanding of Judgment and Decision Making content. Conducted in tutorial/laboratory classes.

Group project involving designing an experiment on Judgment and Decision Making. Includes individual written research proposal (2000 words), group oral presentation in Week 9, and peer evaluation of group contributions. Combines written report (30%), presentation (8%), and peer evaluation (2%).

In-person exam during UNSW Exam Period assessing remaining course topics (Categorisation and Reasoning; Theory and Models; Intelligence and Thinking). Includes Multiple Choice Questions and short-answer essay questions requiring synthesis of knowledge.
